responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "1285FCEC4174DE391664219A6748C521", "The Bull chose his side and freedom arose. Blood splattered on horn and nose. - In underhalls a fist was formed. The Horns of the Bull was born. - Stampeding hooves and horns crimson bright, the Legion was an unchallenged might. - Sing aloud all sons of the horn. Sing aloud their demise divided and forlorn. - Tricked to betrayal were the horns of might. Retreating far and away leaving the Bull alone to fight.")
name: MIDD_0017_TLS_Tablet_TheBalladOfTheBull_12
